full_summary:
## Tender Title
### Precise Support for Temporary Help Services

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) ID: S5029173
A Request for Proposal (RFP), which is open to specific supply holders under EN578-172870, is seeking temporary help services support to the Department of National Defense (DND).

#### Closing Date: July 25, 2024, 13:00 (UTC-4:00)
The tenders should be submitted by:

*Due date:* July 25, 2024, 13:00 (UTC-4:00)

#### Security Level: Secret
Security Cleared Temporary Help Services are required.

#### Description of Requirement
The Department of National Defense requires temporary help services to support the needs of various projects and activities. There are specific supply arrangement holder numbers who are invited to submit a proposal. We require:

*Pre- Contract Security Requirement: Resource Minimum Security Level Required is: Secret*

#### Brief Description of Services Required
Temporary help services contracts for a period of time will be required, with the level of activity to match the projects.

#### Bid Process

*Invitation to Bid:* This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for temporary help services only.

**Submission Details**

* Submission: Mandatory electronic submission
* Submission deadline: July 25, 2024 13:00 (UTC-4:00)
* Document: [S5029173-RFP-for-Competitive-Method-1-Lowest-Price_(0).pdf]
* Attachment: Only proposals and files in compliance with the requirements will be considered for evaluation.

**Contact Information**

* Name: 
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Degrees and hours: (613) 971-7955
* Address
[No addresses are included for security reasons]

**Competitive Bid**
The request for proposals is a competitive, selective tendering process. The contract award will be based on the lowest price received from qualified applicants.

#### Attachments are required - more details available in the linked document above. PLEASE NOTE: Attachment Details are below

Attachments are below: [1 pdf file for S5029173-RFP-for-Competitive-Method-1-Lowest-Price_(0).pdf with instructions and lots]
